author: nloco

review: Purchased the Apple TV in August, 2014.  Worked great for a couple of months, like the interface.  Not fond of the 'oversimplified' old-style ipod knockoff remote.  Then it started.  5 mins into a show, 2 minutes, 40 minutes - random times, the show would stop, as if the internet disconnected.  All other devices in the house working just fine.  Resetting works for another 30 minutes (or maybe 3).  Sometimes we get to watch a whole 40 minute show before it freezes.  Tried complete restore.  Contacted Apple several times.  They keep coming up with new tests to prove it's not the Apple - guess what...It's the Apple.  They refuse to replace it.  Don't buy it, folks, It's not worth the inflated Apple price - this one doesn't come with Apple's great service or product.  On top of that, it doesn't play Amazon Prime, and even Airplay with my ipad and iphone is intermittent.
